songs.lyrics:
[Drum beat]

[Beat change]

[Beat change]

[Verse 1: M. S. Subbulakshmi]
Shuklam Bharadaram Vishnum
Sasi Varnam Chatur Bhujam
Prasanna Vadananam Dyayet
Sarva Vignoba Sandaye

Shuklam Bharadaram Vishnum
Sasi Varnam Chatur Bhujam
Prasanna Vadananam Dyayet
Sarva Vignoba Sandaye

[Beat change]

[Verse 2: S. P. Balasubrahmanyam]
Malai Poluthu
Ah, ah, ah, ah
Hey, ho, hum, la la la
Ah, ah, ah, ah

Malai Poluthu
Ah, ah, ah, ah
Hey, ho, hum, la la la
Ah, ah, ah, ah

Malai Poluthu

[Beat change]

[Verse 3: S. Janaki]
Ottagatha Kattikko Gettiyaaga Ottikko
Vatta Vatta Pottukaari
Othuzhaikka Othukko Patha Vechaa Pathikko
Vaai Vedicha Mottukkaari

Ottagatha Kattikko Gettiyaaga Ottikko
Vatta Vatta Pottukaari
Othuzhaikka Othukko Patha Vechaa Pathikko
Vaai Vedicha Mottukkaari

Vidavaendum Achathai Thodavaendum Uchathai
Athigaalai Chaelai Sollumadi Michathai
Vidavaendum Achathai Thodavaendum Uchathai
Athigaalai Chaelai Sollumadi Michathai

Ottagatha Kattikko Gettiyaaga Ottikko
Vatta Vatta Pottukaari
Othuzhaikka Othukko Patha Vechaa Pathikko
Vaai Vedicha Mottukkaari

[Beat change]

[Verse 4: Anuradha Sriram]
Poweru 1000 watts

[Beat change]

[Verse 5: M.I.A.]
I said hey, is it the sign of the times?
Can we go find something money can't buy?
I said hey, is it the sign of the times?
Is it too late to find something money can't buy?

[Beat change]

[Verse 6: M.I.A.]
Okay, I got this

I'm thankful for my hands, cause it's a good thrower
I'm thankful for my body, cause it's a fucking banger
I'm thankful for my mouth, cause it's a real screamer
But most of all, I'm thankful for my power!

[Beat change]

[Verse 7: M.I.A.]
I’m so tangy, people call me Mathangi
Goddess of word, bitches I’mma keep it banging
Truth is like a rotten tooth, you gotta spit it out!
Let the bottom two, let my wisdom work it out
Big on the underground, can’t knock me down
Vicki Leekx bitches, back by dope demand
I sleep on my talent and I stand by it too
I can say lots with a little words or few like
Like Adam had 'em, yeh, me, the madame
Yeah I’ll introduce you to the dooms do dooms
Come let we go, do you like my perfumes?
Made it at home with some gasoline and shrooms
Oil and water are two extremes
We like fucking carpets, you like fucking brooms
Why is your tattoo some ugly looking thing?
I got many designs they're downloading on Bing
My cousin got his G.C.S.E.'s decorating
He’s handy you might need him when I finish what I’m saying
Let's be frank, you my stan, I'm your stan
I don’t care what you smoke, what you fucking drank
I'm allowed to be pissed at mates who are yanks
Cause it’s not me and you, it's the fucking banks!

Bring the noise when we run upon them!
Bring the noise when we run upon them!

Paper, scissors, got no bomb
Can't touch this, could you get out? Done!

Bring the noise when we run upon them!
Bring the noise when we run upon them!

Free dem-dem-dem-free-dem
Free dem-dem-dem-free-dem
Free dem-dem-dem-dem-free-dem
Free dem-dem-dem-dem-free-dem

Bring the noise when we run upon them
Bring the noise when we run upon them

Free dem-dem-dem-free-dem
Free dem-dem-dem-dem-free-dem

[Beat change]
songs.title: Matangi Mix for Kenzo
